snippet: Toyota added nearly 1.4 million cars, trucks and S.U.V.s to a growing recall for airbags that can explode with too much force.
abstract: Toyota expands airbag-related recall by nearly 1.4 million cars, trucks and SUVs; additions are in response to decision by airbag manufacturer Takata to nearly double the size of its own recall.
lead_paragraph: Toyota added nearly 1.4 million cars, trucks and S.U.V.s to a growing recall for airbags that can explode with too much force.

headline.main: Nearly 1.4. Million Vehicles Added to Toyota Airbag Recall
headline.print_headline: Nearly 1.4. Million Vehicles Added to Toyota Airbag Recall
